scripts.wp-default-theme-delete: wp-env run cli wp theme delete twentyeleven twentytwelve twentythirteen twentyfourteen twentyfifteen twentysixteen twentyseventeen twentynineteen twentytwentyone twentytwenty twentyten
scripts.wp-restore: wp-env run cli wp ai1wm restore
scripts.wp-list: wp-env run cli wp ai1wm list-backups
